app.name: ARSP
app.tagline: AI 驱动的研究支持平台

dashboard.tagline: 探索 AI 驱动的工具，加速您的研究旅程
dashboard.topics_desc: 发现热门研究主题并追踪其发展
dashboard.papers_desc: 上传并使用 AI 提供的洞察分析研究论文
dashboard.plagiarism_desc: 通过先进的查重检测确保原创性
dashboard.journals_desc: 为您的研究获取个性化的期刊推荐
dashboard.government_desc: 使研究与政府优先事项和可持续发展目标（SDG）保持一致
dashboard.impact_desc: 预测您的研究在现实世界中的影响

stats.papers_analyzed_hint: 使用我们的 AI 驱动分析工具

getting_started.title: 入门指南
getting_started.description: 按照以下步骤充分利用 Smart Research Hub
getting_started.step1_desc: 从上传论文以进行 AI 驱动分析开始
getting_started.step3_desc: 获取个性化的期刊推荐
getting_started.step4_desc: 了解您的工作可能产生的影响

topics.title: 主题发现
topics.description: 探索您领域中的热门研究主题和新兴领域
topics.search_placeholder: 例如，计算机科学、生物学
topics.empty_message: 点击上方按钮，探索热门研究主题

papers.title: 论文分析
papers.description: 上传并使用 AI 提供的洞察分析研究论文
papers.upload_description: 上传 PDF 文件以进行 AI 驱动的分析和洞察
papers.empty_message: 上传您的第一篇研究论文以开始

plagiarism.title: 查重检测
plagiarism.description: 通过先进的 AI 驱动查重检测确保原创性
plagiarism.check_description: 在下方粘贴您的摘要或研究文本，以检查抄袭情况并获取原创性评分
plagiarism.text_placeholder: 在此粘贴您的研究摘要或文本（至少 100 个字符）...
plagiarism.similar_sources_desc: Sources where similar content was found
plagiarism.flagged_sections_desc: Text segments that match existing sources
plagiarism.common_terms_desc: These terms are commonly used in academic literature and don't necessarily indicate plagiarism.

messages.action_required_text: This section is nearly identical to an existing source. Rewrite or cite properly.
messages.no_data_banner: These sources were flagged as similar. Detailed word-level analysis not available for all sources.
messages.no_plagiarism_desc: Your text shows high originality. Great work!
messages.empty_desc: Paste your text above to get started

tips.title: Tips for Researchers
tips.paraphrase: Paraphrase properly and add your own analysis
tips.cite: Add proper citations for all sources
tips.quotes: Use direct quotes sparingly and mark them clearly
tips.analysis: Include your own critical analysis and interpretation

empty.feature1_desc: Check against millions of sources online
empty.feature2_desc: Get detailed plagiarism reports in seconds
empty.feature3_desc: See exactly where similar content appears

journals.title: 期刊推荐
journals.description: 根据您的研究获取个性化的期刊推荐
journals.form_description: 输入您的研究摘要和关键词以获取期刊推荐
journals.keywords_placeholder: 例如，机器学习，深度学习，AI
journals.empty_message: 输入您的摘要和关键词以查找合适的期刊

errors.network: 网络错误。请检查您的连接。
errors.auth: 身份验证失败。请重新登录。
